Proprietary Ecuadorian Cuban-seed hybrid wrapper (red/brown)
First vitola under a new brand from Germany, rolled in DR. 
Limited first run of 1000 numbered slipcases of 2 cigars each, 2500 sticks total in first run. I have 3 slipcases on order and they are about to ship.
